userTelegram.welcome: Welcome! In this bot you will be able to get logins code and other messages from Trustee Plus
userLogin.notActive.telegram: Account is not active, please write to support
userLogin.notValidTelegramCodeStatus.tel: Someone tried to login with expired/empty code {ip}
userLogin.notValidTelegramCodeValue.tele: Someone tried to login with wrong code {ip}
userContacts.pending.pushDesc: You are in contacts list of user {userMobile}, please help him start using Trustee Plus
userContacts.pendingMutual.pushDesc: You are in contacts list of user {userMobile} ({mutualDisplayName}), please help him start using Trustee Plus
userContacts.activeMutual.pushDesc: You are in contacts list of user {userMobile} ({mutualDisplayName}), now you can send him assets in Trustee Plus internal transfer
userData.tgNewVerification.telegram: User {mobile} requests telegram username approval, code: {code}
userData.tgNewVerificationWillBeJoined.t: as you have another account with this telegram in Trustee Plus - by approval old account will be disabled. Please, move balance if you have any
userData.tgOldVerification.telegram: User {mobile} requests telegram username change to @{telegramUsername}
